creator: CricHeroes Pvt. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Get -

🏏 Ball by ball live cricket scores and commentary for your local cricket matches.

📺 Live stream your local cricket matches just the way you see it on TV.

🏆 If you are a tournament organiser, manage your entire tournament absolutely FREE! Get a dedicated page, leaderboard, points table, schedule, boundary tracker, and more.

🎦 Enjoy cricket videos, news, quizzes, polls and more.

🛍 CricHeroes Market - The ultimate place to trade your products, services, or skills with millions of cricket enthusiasts in India and abroad.

🗒 Book Scorers, Umpires, Commentators, Grounds for your matches.

📊 Become a world-class cricketer by analysing your own and others’ strengths and weaknesses with CricInsights.

🙅‍ Your own cricket profile just like an international cricketer.

🏅 Show your talent and get recognition (badges, awards and offers) for your every achievement.

CricHeroes is an app for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world.

With millions of cricketers using CricHeroes to live score their local cricket matches and tournaments, it is already the number one Cricket Scoring App in the world. It is also the editor’s choice with more than 4.8 ratings!

Features:

Live Cricket Scores and Ball by Ball Commentary

- Live score updates of your local cricket matches
- Ball by ball commentary for detailed analysis
- Full cricket match scorecard and summary
- Analyse your match with Wagon Wheel, Manhattan, Worm, Run rate graphs.
- Heroes of the match: Player of the Match, Best Batsman, Best Bowler.
- Most Valuable Player (MVP) of the match.
- Live stream your local cricket match just the way you see it on TV.

CricHeroes Market

- Buy and Sell Cricket-related products or services.
- Sell your products or services in multiple locations.
- Buyers can contact you via WhatsApp or Phone call.
- Explore a wide range of cricket products such as bats, balls, kits on CricHeroes Market.

CricHeroes Pro Membership

- Become a world-class cricketer with CricInsights (Available under CricHeroes Pro membership).
- Player Insights: Analyse yours and every other player’s profile. Compare yourself with other cricketers and see who wins in a head to head battle.
- Match Insights: Analyse your recent match to figure out what went wrong and right and prepare for your next battle.
- Tournament Insights: Analyse tournaments like a master cricketer and create winning strategies for every match.
- Team Insights: Know your opposition team before your match and make a winning strategy.

Cricket Ecosystem

- Book cricket scorers, umpires, commentators, grounds for your matches.
- Explore cricket shops and cricket academies near your locations.
- List your Cricket Academy, Cricket Ground, and Cricket Shop to get more business.
- List your services as an Umpire, Scorer or Commentator and earn more.

CricHeroes is made with love by passionate cricketers for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world!

Looking forward to having you on CricHeroes and let us know your feedback and suggestions to improve the app. We are just one phone call away at +918141665555.
descriptionShort: The Best Free Cricket App to Live Score Your Cricket Matches and Tournaments. 🏏

- Performance improvement.

descriptionShort: The Best Free Cricket App to Live Score Your Cricket Matches and Tournaments. 🏏

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new in version 6.4

#Stories
Introducing stories! Well, everyone has it so why not us?

#Nearby Matches
Explore matches around you on a map. Look for that nifty map button on My Cricket > Matches.

#New OUT screen
Nobody likes to get out but at least we made it beautiful!

#Year-wise Team Stats
Which was the better year for your team? Find out now from Team Stats > Filters.

#Best Wicket-keeper
Find out the best wicket-keeper of your tournament from Fielding leaderboard > Filters.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new in version 6.5

#DLS Method
Finally, it’s here! Apply built-in DLS method to your rain-affected matches. Don’t let rains spoil the fun.

#Web-based Organiser Admin
Now tournament organisers can manage their tournaments from a PC with our brand new web-based admin. Just login on our website.

#Tournament QR Code
Organisers can share tournament QR Code with their players or print it on a big banner to display on ground.

What’s new in version 6.6

Reactions and Comments
Finally, some action! Now you will be able to React and Comment on your favorite posts on Feed. Appreciate your friends with reactions like Well played and Respect.

Pro Landing Page
We have an exclusive area for CricHeroes Pro members. Access all CricInsights, Partner Benefits and Additional Offers from one place.

More Stories

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new in 7.0
- Now request bookings of slots directly from the app for select grounds in select cities.
- Get an alert if the same player is playing from multiple teams in a tournament.
- Watch and learn how you can become better by analysing various insights with exclusive videos for CricHeroes Pro members.
- Exciting new CricInsights added. Find which balls are you most likely to score (or give) a dot ball in an over!
- Adding teams in tournament is easier with multi-lingual support.

# What’s new in 7.1

#CricHeroes 2021 Resolution
Share 10% of Pro revenue with deserving cricketers from humble background. Help us help them. Become a Pro today.

#Better Profile Pic
Find beautiful square and circular profile pics everywhere in the app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# What’s New in Version 7.4

## Explore
Introducing brand new Explore in CricHeroes. Your last week’s performance, upcoming tournaments, latest quiz, poll and much more at your fingertips.

## Last Week’s Performance
Every Monday, get a quick summary of how you performed in the last week.

## Commentary
Well, we continue to make our commentary, the most vital part of a scorecard, world-class.

## Power Play
Now the scorer can add multiple Power Plays in a match.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# What’s new in 7.5

- Now record separate video of every ball automatically while live streaming. Ask the scorer to enable the “Auto” mode.
- Analysing every batsman and bowler of the opponent team is way cooler now. Checkout Insights of your upcoming match.
- Playing a match (or tournament) having special rules for Wide and No Ball? Well, manage them now from Match Settings.
- How many minutes you stayed on the pitch for your innings? Now you would know from the Match Scorecard.

# What’s New in Version 7.4

## Explore
Introducing brand new Explore in CricHeroes. Your last week’s performance, upcoming tournaments, latest quiz, poll and much more at your fingertips.

## Last Week’s Performance
Every Monday, get a quick summary of how you performed in the last week.

## Commentary
Well, we continue to make our commentary, the most vital part of a scorecard, world-class.

## Power Play
Now the scorer can add multiple Power Plays in a match.

## Score Super Over

so that you don’t have to worry about it on the Match Day.

Are you vaccinated? Well, flaunt it on your CricHeroes Profile Pic with our brand new stickers.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new in 7.8

# The Hundred
Are you excited about this new fast-paced format of Cricket invented by the ECB? Well, try it in your match before them!

# Challenge Teams
Find the best teams around you and challenge them for a match.

# Verified Teams
Get a verified tag for your team automatically if it has more than 11 verified players with profile pics.

# DLS 4
Match stopped due to rain? No problem. The latest version of DLS is now available for your rain-affected matches.

# What’s new in version 7.8.1

## Highlights
Watch highlights of your match once it’s over. Applicable for ball by ball live streamed matches.

## Super Five
Already started scoring The Hundred on CricHeroes? Well, now you will be able to score Super Five too if your match is tied.

## New Scorecard (Web)
Check out the new refreshing scorecard page on CricHeroes Website.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# What’s new in version 8.0
## Pair Cricket Scoring
A very popular format across the world generally played in Box Cricket settings. Now score your Pair Cricket matches and tournaments free on CricHeroes.
## Indian Languages
No English? No problem! Start your match or tournament in your own language. From Punjabi to Malayalam, all major Indian languages are supported now.
## Share Screenshot
Love sharing screenshots of your badges or awards? Well, share them in style from the app itself.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# What’s new in version 8.3

## Player Stats
Separate leather and tennis ball stats and much more. Don’t forget to check your overall stats.

## Auto Schedule
Organisers can generate the entire schedule of their tournaments automatically now. A BIG time saver!

Purchase unlimited Live Streaming and Score Ticker for a day and for a month directly from the app.

## Opponents in Start a Match
Find your opponents easily while starting a match.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# What’s new in version 8.3

## Player Stats
Separate leather and tennis ball stats and much more. Don’t forget to check your overall stats.

## Auto Schedule
Organisers can generate the entire schedule of their tournaments automatically now. A BIG time saver!

## Daily / Monthly Plans
Purchase unlimited Live Streaming and Score Ticker for a day and for a month directly from the app.

## Opponents in Start a Match
Find your opponents easily while starting a match.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new in version 8.5
# CricPay
Now manage your team expenses like ground booking fees, tournament fees, lunch, etc effortlessly via CricPay.
# 5 kinds of Batters
Steady, Classicist, Accumulator, Hard Hitter or Destroyer. What kind of a batter you are? Now you will know with this exciting new tag on your profile.
# Internal Messaging
Connect with fellow players within CricHeroes only using the brand new internal messaging module. Look for the message icon on Player Profile and Home Screen.

title: Cricket Scoring App-CricHeroes

creator: CricHeroes Pvt. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Here is why you should use CricHeroes Scoring app- The Cricket Scorer App to score your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments digitally.

📢 Broadcast your cricket scores live ball to ball and get an international-grade match scorecard.

📺 Live stream your local cricket tournaments and cricket matches like international matches.

😎 Get your own world-class cricket profile with cricket stats like an international cricketer.

🏅 Show your talent and get recognition (badges, awards and offers) for your every achievement on cricket ground.

🏆 If you are a tournament organiser, register and manage your entire cricket tournament absolutely FREE! Get a dedicated tournament page, leaderboard, points table (standings), schedule, boundary tracker, and more along with live cricket scoring.

🗓️ Create an automatic cricket schedule for your tournament in a few clicks with the help of an auto-schedule generator.

🏏Know how much margin your team needs to win in your group match to qualify for the knock-outs with the help of Smart NRR Calculator.

🎦 Cricket Feed - Enjoy cricket videos, cricket news, cricket quizzes, cricket polls, cricket stories and remain updated with friends’ matches on CricHeroes Feed.

🛍 CricHeroes Market - The ultimate place to sell your cricket products, cricket services, or cricket skills with millions of cricket enthusiasts in India and abroad.

🗒 Cricket Ecosystem - Book Scorers, Umpires, Commentators, Grounds for your cricket matches and cricket tournaments. Find Cricket Academies, Cricket Shops near you. Contact Bat Manufacturers, Cricket Uniform Designers, etc directly.

📊 CricInsights - Become a world-class cricketer by analysing your own and others’ strengths and weaknesses with CricInsights. Know your form, find preferred batting and bowling positions, compare yourself with friends and much more.

CricHeroes is a world-class cricket scorekeeping app for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world.

With millions of cricketers using CricHeroes to live score their local cricket matches and tournaments digitally, it is already the #1 FREE Cricket Scoring App in the world. It is also the editor’s choice with more than 4.7 ratings!

Detailed Features and Benefits:

Live Cricket Scores with Ball by Ball Commentary

- Live cricket score updates of your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments
- Ball by ball commentary with detailed cricket graphs and match analysis
- Analyse your cricket match digitally with Wagon Wheel, Manhattan Graph, Worm Graph, Run Rate Graphs.

Live Streaming

Live stream your cricket matches using just the mobile phone or using OBS, VMix or any other such software on your laptop.

Leaderboards

CH Leaderboard: Check out all-time rankings of grassroots cricketers of batting, bowling and fielding on the CH Leaderboard.
Top Performers: Real time daily, weekly and monthly ranking of amateue cricketers based on their performances.
Table Toppers: All time ranking of cricket teams based on their performances on the CricHeroes App.
Scorer Leaderboard: The best cricket scorers of your region based on Scoring Quality Score (SQS) only on the CricHeroes App.

CricPay

Manage all expenses of your cricket team like ground booking fees, tournament registration fees, lunch, cricket uniform cost, etc via CricPay.

CricHeroes DM

Connect with other cricketers directly on the CricHeroes App via CricHeroes DM.

Cricket Stories

Enjoy cricket trivia, cricket news, cricket polls, cricket quizzes, top performers around you in a story format only on the CricHeroes App.

Cricket Feed
A personalised cricket feed with all yours and your followees’ matches, tournaments, badges and awards.

Looking forward to having you on CricHeroes and let us know your feedback and suggestions to improve the app. We are just one phone call away at +918141665555.

NOTE: If you are using Samsung J7, please download build from here - https://bit.ly/3iGDx7z
descriptionShort: No. 1 cricket scorer app for live scoring, live streaming local cricket matches.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# What’s new in 8.7

## Pitch Type
What kind of pitch you generally play matches on? Do select that while starting a tournament or its match.

## Scorer Profile
Now find Scoring Quality Score (SQS) on the scorer profile and hire quality scorers for your tournament.

## CricPay
Have you tried using CricPay for managing your team expenses? Well, now you can also send a reminder for the payment.

## Search
Improved the overall search experience for matches, tournaments and teams.

descriptionHtml:

🗓️ Create an automatic cricket schedule for your tournament in a few clicks with the help of an auto-schedule generator.

🏏Know how much margin your team needs to win in your group match to qualify for the knock-outs with the help of Smart NRR Calculator.

🎦 Cricket Feed - Enjoy cricket videos, cricket news, cricket quizzes, cricket polls, cricket stories and remain updated with friends’ matches on CricHeroes Feed.

🛍 CricHeroes Market - The ultimate place to sell your cricket products, cricket services, or cricket skills with millions of cricket enthusiasts in India and abroad.

🗒 Cricket Ecosystem - Book Scorers, Umpires, Commentators, Grounds for your cricket matches and cricket tournaments. Find Cricket Academies, Cricket Shops near you. Contact Bat Manufacturers, Cricket Uniform Designers, etc directly.

CricHeroes is a world-class cricket scorekeeping app for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world.

With millions of cricketers using CricHeroes to live score their local cricket matches and tournaments digitally, it is already the #1 FREE Cricket Scoring App in the world. It is also the editor’s choice with more than 4.7 ratings!

Detailed Features and Benefits:

Live Cricket Scores with Ball by Ball Commentary

- Live cricket score updates of your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments
- Ball by ball commentary with detailed cricket graphs and match analysis
- Analyse your cricket match digitally with Wagon Wheel, Manhattan Graph, Worm Graph, Run Rate Graphs.

Live Streaming

Live stream your cricket matches using just the mobile phone or using OBS, VMix or any other such software on your laptop.

Leaderboards

CH Leaderboard: Check out all-time rankings of grassroots cricketers of batting, bowling and fielding on the CH Leaderboard.
Top Performers: Real time daily, weekly and monthly ranking of amateue cricketers based on their performances.
Table Toppers: All time ranking of cricket teams based on their performances on the CricHeroes App.
Scorer Leaderboard: The best cricket scorers of your region based on Scoring Quality Score (SQS) only on the CricHeroes App.

CricPay

Manage all expenses of your cricket team like ground booking fees, tournament registration fees, lunch, cricket uniform cost, etc via CricPay.

Enjoy cricket trivia, cricket news, cricket polls, cricket quizzes, top performers around you in a story format only on the CricHeroes App.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new in 9.2

## Match Highlights
Get highlights of your live streamed match automatically on the scorecard. Players will be notified once the highlights are ready.
*For quality live streamed matches only.

## ICC New Playing Conditions
1. The new batter will be on strike by default in case of a catch out.
2. Mankaded is now simply Run Out.

descriptionHtml:
Cricket Scoring Counting Application - The CricHeroes Cricket Scorer App to score your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments digitally.

📢 Broadcast your cricket scores live ball to ball and get an international-grade match scorecard.

📺 Live stream your local cricket tournaments & cricket matches like international matches.

😎 Get your own world-class cricket profile with cricket stats like an international cricketer.

🏅 Show your talent and get recognition (badges, awards and offers) for your every achievement on cricket ground.

🏆 If you are a tournament organiser, register and manage your entire cricket tournament absolutely FREE! Get a dedicated tournament page, leaderboard, points table (standings), schedule, boundary tracker, and more along with live cricket scoring.

🗓️ Create an automatic cricket schedule for your tournament in a few clicks with the help of an auto-schedule generator.

🏏Know how much margin your team needs to win in your group match to qualify for the knock-outs with the help of Smart NRR Calculator.

🎦 Cricket Feed - Enjoy cricket videos, cricket news, cricket quizzes, cricket polls, cricket stories and remain updated with friends’ matches on CricHeroes Feed.

🛍 CricHeroes Market - The ultimate place to sell your cricket products, cricket services, or cricket skills with millions of cricket enthusiasts in India and abroad.

🗒 Cricket Ecosystem - Book Scorers, Umpires, Commentators, Grounds for your cricket matches and cricket tournaments. Find Cricket Academies, Cricket Shops near you. Contact Bat Manufacturers, Cricket Uniform Designers, etc directly.

📊 CricInsights - Become a world-class cricketer by analysing your own and others’ strengths and weaknesses with CricInsights. Know your form, find preferred batting and bowling positions, compare yourself with friends and much more.

CricHeroes is a world-class cricket scorekeeping app for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world.

With millions of cricketers using CricHeroes to live score their local cricket matches and tournaments digitally, it is already the #1 FREE Cricket Scoring App in the world. It is also the editor’s choice with more than 4.7 ratings!

Detailed Features and Benefits:

Live Cricket Scores with Ball by Ball Commentary

- Live cricket score updates of your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments
- Ball by ball commentary with detailed cricket graphs and match analysis
- Analyse your cricket match digitally with Wagon Wheel, Manhattan Graph, Worm Graph, Run Rate Graphs.

Live Streaming

Live stream your cricket matches using just the mobile phone or using OBS, VMix or any other such software on your laptop.

Leaderboards

CH Leaderboard: Check out all-time rankings of grassroots cricketers of batting, bowling and fielding on the CH Leaderboard.
Top Performers: Real time daily, weekly and monthly ranking of amateue cricketers based on their performances.
Table Toppers: All time ranking of cricket teams based on their performances on the CricHeroes App.
Scorer Leaderboard: The best cricket scorers of your region based on Scoring Quality Score (SQS) only on the CricHeroes App.

CricPay

Manage all expenses of your cricket team like ground booking fees, tournament registration fees, lunch, cricket uniform cost, etc via CricPay.

CricHeroes DM

Connect with other cricketers directly on the CricHeroes App via CricHeroes DM.

Cricket Stories

Enjoy cricket trivia, cricket news, cricket polls, cricket quizzes, top performers around you in a story format only on the CricHeroes App.

Cricket Feed
A personalised cricket feed with all yours and your followees’ matches, tournaments, badges and awards.

Looking forward to having you on CricHeroes and let us know your feedback and suggestions to improve the app. We are just one phone call away at +918141665555.

NOTE: If you are using Samsung J7, please download build from here - https://bit.ly/3iGDx7z
descriptionShort: No. 1 cricket scorer app for live scoring, live streaming local cricket matches.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new in 9.2

## Match Highlights
Get highlights of your live streamed match automatically on the scorecard. Players will be notified once the highlights are ready.
*For quality live streamed matches only.

## ICC New Playing Conditions
1. The new batter will be on strike by default in case of a catch out.
2. Mankaded is now simply Run Out.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# What’s new in version 9.4 (Android)
## CricPay
Now add your UPI ID in CricPay and ask your team mates to pay directly via UPI. CricPay lets you manage your cricket related expenses directly on the CricHeroes App. Try it now from More > CricPay.
# 50-ball 60-ball 70-ball!
Want a shorter format than The Hundred? Well, now change the number of balls you want to play in the same format as The Hundred!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# What’s new in 9.5

## Super Sponsor
Add your tournament sponsors yourself and give them fantastic visibility on your tournament page and match scorecards.

## Shots Analysis
Analyse all the shots of the match from Match Scorecard > Analysis. Make sure the scorer has recorded the shots properly.

## Highlights
Now find all your Highlights in My Cricket and Player Profile. Also enjoy curated Highlights in Watch section.

- Ball by ball commentary with detailed cricket graphs and match analysis

Live Streaming

Live stream your cricket matches using just the mobile phone or using OBS, VMix or any other such software on your laptop.

Leaderboards

Connect with other cricketers directly on the CricHeroes App via CricHeroes DM.

Cricket Stories

Enjoy cricket trivia, cricket news, cricket polls, cricket quizzes, top performers around you in a story format only on the CricHeroes App.

A personalised cricket feed with all yours and your followees’ matches, tournaments, badges and awards.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# What’s new in 9.5.2

## Super Sponsor
Add your tournament sponsors yourself and give them fantastic visibility on your tournament page and match scorecards.

Analyse all the shots of the match from Match Scorecard > Analysis. Make sure the scorer has recorded the shots properly.

## Highlights
Now find all your Highlights in My Cricket and Player Profile. Also enjoy curated Highlights in Watch section.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# What’s new in version 9.6

## Match Schedule
Now download the entire tournament schedule as one image and share it with all the captains on WhatsApp.

## Negative Runs (Box Cricket)
Scorers have facility to add negative runs in a Box Cricket match.

## Head to Head
Find head to head stats before your match starts in Quick Insights.

## Badges
It’s easier to celebrate the heroes of your match now. Find all badges unlocked in a match under HEROES tab in Scorecard.

# What’s new in 9.8

## CricHeroes Awards 2022
Did you watch the CricHeroes Awards 2022 hosted by Jatin Sapru? If not, check the award show and winners today from side menu.

## Add multiple players from Contacts

## Purchase History
Get history of all the premium features you have purchased from CricHeroes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# What’s new in 9.8

## CricHeroes Awards 2022
Did you watch the CricHeroes Awards 2022 hosted by Jatin Sapru? If not, check the award show and winners today from side menu.

## Login via WhatsApp
Tired of waiting for the OTP to login? Well, try WhatsApp login powered by OTPLess.

## Add multiple players from Contacts
Now add your entire team in one go from your contacts.

## Purchase History
Get history of all the premium features you have purchased from CricHeroes.

title: Cricket Scoring App-CricHeroes

descriptionHtml:
Cricket Scoring Counting Application - The CricHeroes Cricket Scorer App to score your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments digitally.

📢 Broadcast your cricket scores live ball to ball and get an international-grade match scorecard.

📺 Live stream your local cricket tournaments & cricket matches like international matches.

😎 Get your own world-class cricket profile with cricket stats like an international cricketer.

🏅 Show your talent and get recognition (badges, awards and offers) for your every achievement on cricket ground.

🏆 If you are a tournament organiser, register and manage your entire cricket tournament absolutely FREE! Get a dedicated tournament page, leaderboard, points table (standings), schedule, boundary tracker, and more along with live cricket scoring.

🗓️ Create an automatic cricket schedule for your tournament in a few clicks with the help of an auto-schedule generator.

🏏Know how much margin your team needs to win in your group match to qualify for the knock-outs with the help of Smart NRR Calculator.

🎦 Cricket Feed - Enjoy cricket videos, cricket news, cricket quizzes, cricket polls, cricket stories and remain updated with friends’ matches on CricHeroes Feed.

🛍 CricHeroes Market - The ultimate place to sell your cricket products, cricket services, or cricket skills with millions of cricket enthusiasts in India and abroad.

🗒 Cricket Ecosystem - Book Scorers, Umpires, Commentators, Grounds for your cricket matches and cricket tournaments. Find Cricket Academies, Cricket Shops near you. Contact Bat Manufacturers, Cricket Uniform Designers, etc directly.

📊 CricInsights - Become a world-class cricketer by analysing your own and others’ strengths and weaknesses with CricInsights. Know your form, find preferred batting and bowling positions, compare yourself with friends and much more.

CricHeroes is a world-class cricket scorekeeping app for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world.

With millions of cricketers using CricHeroes to live score their local cricket matches and tournaments digitally, it is already the #1 FREE Cricket Scoring App in the world. It is also the editor’s choice with more than 4.7 ratings!

Detailed Features and Benefits:

Live Cricket Scores with Ball by Ball Commentary

- Live cricket score updates of your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments
- Ball by ball commentary with detailed cricket graphs and match analysis
- Analyse your cricket match digitally with Wagon Wheel, Manhattan Graph, Worm Graph, Run Rate Graphs.

Live Streaming

Live stream your cricket matches using just the mobile phone or using OBS, VMix or any other such software on your laptop.

Leaderboards

CH Leaderboard: Check out all-time rankings of grassroots cricketers of batting, bowling and fielding on the CH Leaderboard.
Top Performers: Real time daily, weekly and monthly ranking of amateue cricketers based on their performances.
Table Toppers: All time ranking of cricket teams based on their performances on the CricHeroes App.
Scorer Leaderboard: The best cricket scorers of your region based on Scoring Quality Score (SQS) only on the CricHeroes App.

CricPay

Manage all expenses of your cricket team like ground booking fees, tournament registration fees, lunch, cricket uniform cost, etc via CricPay.

CricHeroes DM

Connect with other cricketers directly on the CricHeroes App via CricHeroes DM.

Cricket Stories

Enjoy cricket trivia, cricket news, cricket polls, cricket quizzes, top performers around you in a story format only on the CricHeroes App.

Cricket Feed
A personalised cricket feed with all yours and your followees’ matches, tournaments, badges and awards.

Looking forward to having you on CricHeroes and let us know your feedback and suggestions to improve the app. We are just one phone call away at +918141665555.

descriptionHtml:
Cricket Scoring Counting Application - The CricHeroes Cricket Scorer App to score your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments digitally.

📢 Broadcast your cricket scores live ball to ball and get an international-grade match scorecard.

📺 Live stream your local cricket tournaments & cricket matches like international matches.

😎 Get your own world-class cricket profile with cricket stats like an international cricketer.

🏅 Show your talent and get recognition (badges, awards and offers) for your every achievement on cricket ground.

🏆 If you are a tournament organiser, register and manage your entire cricket tournament absolutely FREE! Get a dedicated tournament page, leaderboard, points table (standings), schedule, boundary tracker, and more along with live cricket scoring.

🗓️ Create an automatic cricket schedule for your tournament in a few clicks with the help of an auto-schedule generator.

🏏Know how much margin your team needs to win in your group match to qualify for the knock-outs with the help of Smart NRR Calculator.

🎦 Cricket Feed - Enjoy cricket videos, cricket news, cricket quizzes, cricket polls, cricket stories and remain updated with friends’ matches on CricHeroes Feed.

🛍 CricHeroes Market - The ultimate place to sell your cricket products, cricket services, or cricket skills with millions of cricket enthusiasts in India and abroad.

🗒 Cricket Ecosystem - Book Scorers, Umpires, Commentators, Grounds for your cricket matches and cricket tournaments. Find Cricket Academies, Cricket Shops near you. Contact Bat Manufacturers, Cricket Uniform Designers, etc directly.

📊 CricInsights - Become a world-class cricketer by analysing your own and others’ strengths and weaknesses with CricInsights. Know your form, find preferred batting and bowling positions, compare yourself with friends and much more.

CricHeroes is a world-class cricket scorekeeping app for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world.

With millions of cricketers using CricHeroes to live score their local cricket matches and tournaments digitally, it is already the #1 FREE Cricket Scoring App in the world. It is also the editor’s choice with more than 4.7 ratings!

Detailed Features and Benefits:

Live Cricket Scores with Ball by Ball Commentary

- Live cricket score updates of your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments
- Ball by ball commentary with detailed cricket graphs and match analysis
- Analyse your cricket match digitally with Wagon Wheel, Manhattan Graph, Worm Graph, Run Rate Graphs.

Live Streaming

Live stream your cricket matches using just the mobile phone or using OBS, VMix or any other such software on your laptop.

Leaderboards

CH Leaderboard: Check out all-time rankings of grassroots cricketers of batting, bowling and fielding on the CH Leaderboard.
Top Performers: Real time daily, weekly and monthly ranking of amateue cricketers based on their performances.
Table Toppers: All time ranking of cricket teams based on their performances on the CricHeroes App.
Scorer Leaderboard: The best cricket scorers of your region based on Scoring Quality Score (SQS) only on the CricHeroes App.

CricPay

Manage all expenses of your cricket team like ground booking fees, tournament registration fees, lunch, cricket uniform cost, etc via CricPay.

CricHeroes DM

Connect with other cricketers directly on the CricHeroes App via CricHeroes DM.

Cricket Stories

Enjoy cricket trivia, cricket news, cricket polls, cricket quizzes, top performers around you in a story format only on the CricHeroes App.

Cricket Feed
A personalised cricket feed with all yours and your followees’ matches, tournaments, badges and awards.

Looking forward to having you on CricHeroes and let us know your feedback and suggestions to improve the app. We are just one phone call away at +918141665555.

📊 CricInsights - Become a world-class cricketer by analysing your own and others’ strengths and weaknesses with CricInsights. Know your form, find preferred batting and bowling positions, compare yourself with friends and much more.

CricHeroes is a world-class cricket scorekeeping app for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world.

With millions of cricketers using CricHeroes to live score their local cricket matches and tournaments digitally, it is already the #1 FREE Cricket Scoring App in the world. It is also the editor’s choice with more than 4.7 ratings!

Detailed Features and Benefits:

Live Cricket Scores with Ball by Ball Commentary

- Live cricket score updates of your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments
- Ball by ball commentary with detailed cricket graphs and match analysis
- Analyse your cricket match digitally with Wagon Wheel, Manhattan Graph, Worm Graph, Run Rate Graphs.

Live Streaming

Live stream your cricket matches using just the mobile phone or using OBS, VMix or any other such software on your laptop.

Leaderboards

CH Leaderboard: Check out all-time rankings of grassroots cricketers of batting, bowling and fielding on the CH Leaderboard.
Top Performers: Real time daily, weekly and monthly ranking of amateue cricketers based on their performances.
Table Toppers: All time ranking of cricket teams based on their performances on the CricHeroes App.
Scorer Leaderboard: The best cricket scorers of your region based on Scoring Quality Score (SQS) only on the CricHeroes App.

CricPay

Manage all expenses of your cricket team like ground booking fees, tournament registration fees, lunch, cricket uniform cost, etc via CricPay.

CricHeroes DM

Connect with other cricketers directly on the CricHeroes App via CricHeroes DM.

Cricket Stories

Enjoy cricket trivia, cricket news, cricket polls, cricket quizzes, top performers around you in a story format only on the CricHeroes App.

Cricket Feed
A personalised cricket feed with all yours and your followees’ matches, tournaments, badges and awards.

Looking forward to having you on CricHeroes and let us know your feedback and suggestions to improve the app. We are just one phone call away at +918141665555.

# Report Match
Found a scoring mistake? Well, reporting your match is even better now. Try it from Match Scorecard > Settings.

📺 Live stream your local cricket tournaments and cricket matches like international matches.

🏆 If you are a tournament organiser, register and manage your entire cricket tournament absolutely FREE! Get a dedicated tournament page, leaderboard, points table (standings), schedule, boundary tracker, and more along with live cricket scoring.

🗓️ Create an automatic cricket schedule for your tournament in a few clicks with the help of an auto-schedule generator.

🏏Know how much margin your team needs to win in your group match to qualify for the knock-outs with the help of Smart NRR Calculator.

🎦 Cricket Feed - Enjoy cricket videos, cricket news, cricket quizzes, cricket polls, cricket stories and remain updated with friends’ matches on CricHeroes Feed.

🛍 CricHeroes Market - The ultimate place to sell your cricket products, cricket services, or cricket skills with millions of cricket enthusiasts in India and abroad.

🗒 Cricket Community - Book Scorers, Umpires, Commentators, Grounds for your cricket matches and cricket tournaments. Find Cricket Academies, Cricket Shops near you. Contact Bat Manufacturers, Cricket Uniform Designers, Trophy Vendors directly.

📊 CricInsights - Become a world-class cricketer by analysing your own and others’ strengths and weaknesses with CricInsights. Know your form, find preferred batting and bowling positions, compare yourself with friends and much more.

CricHeroes is a world-class Cricket Scoring app for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world.

With millions of cricketers using CricHeroes to live score their local cricket matches and tournaments digitally, it is already the #1 FREE Cricket Scoring App in the world. It is also the editor’s choice with more than 4.7 ratings!

Detailed Features and Benefits:

Live Cricket Scores with Ball by Ball Commentary

- Live cricket score updates of your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments
- Ball by ball commentary with detailed cricket graphs and match analysis
- Analyse your cricket match digitally with Wagon Wheel, Manhattan Graph, Worm Graph, Run Rate Graphs.

Live Streaming

Live stream your cricket matches using just the mobile phone or using OBS, VMix or any other such software on your laptop.

Leaderboards

CH Leaderboard: Check out all-time rankings of grassroots cricketers of batting, bowling and fielding on the CH Leaderboard.
Top Performers: Real time daily, weekly and monthly ranking of amateue cricketers based on their performances.

Table Toppers: All time ranking of cricket teams based on their performances on the CricHeroes App.

Scorer Leaderboard: The best cricket scorers of your region based on Scoring Quality Score (SQS) only on the CricHeroes App.

CricPay

Manage all expenses of your cricket team like ground booking fees, tournament registration fees, lunch, cricket uniform cost, etc via CricPay.

CricHeroes DM

Connect with other cricketers directly on the CricHeroes App via DM.

Cricket Stories

Enjoy cricket trivia, cricket news, cricket polls, cricket quizzes, top performers around you in a story format only on the CricHeroes.

Cricket Feed

A personalised cricket feed with all yours and your followees’ matches, tournaments, badges and awards.

creator: CricHeroes Pvt. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Here is why you should use CricHeroes - The Cricket Scorer App to score your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments digitally.

🏏 Broadcast your cricket scores live ball to ball and get an international-grade match scorecard.

📺 Live stream your local cricket tournaments and cricket matches like international matches.

😎 Get your own world-class cricket profile with cricket stats like an international cricketer.

🏅 Show your talent and get recognition (badges, awards and offers) for your every achievement on cricket ground.

🏆 If you are a tournament organiser, register and manage your entire cricket tournament absolutely FREE! Get a dedicated tournament page, leaderboard, points table (standings), schedule, boundary tracker, and more along with live cricket scoring.

🗓️ Create an automatic cricket schedule for your tournament in a few clicks with the help of an auto-schedule generator.

Know how much margin your team needs to win in your group match to qualify for the knock-outs with the help of Smart NRR Calculator.

🎦 Cricket Feed - Enjoy cricket videos, cricket news, cricket quizzes, cricket polls, cricket stories and remain updated with friends’ matches on CricHeroes Feed.

🛍 CricHeroes Market - The ultimate place to sell your cricket products, cricket services, or cricket skills with millions of cricket enthusiasts in India and abroad.

🗒 Cricket Community - Book Scorers, Umpires, Commentators, Grounds for your cricket matches and cricket tournaments. Find Cricket Academies, Cricket Shops near you. Contact Bat Manufacturers, Cricket Uniform Designers, Trophy Vendors directly.

📊 CricInsights - Become a world-class cricketer by analysing your own and others’ strengths and weaknesses with CricInsights. Know your form, find preferred batting and bowling positions, compare yourself with friends and much more.

CricHeroes is a world-class cricket scorekeeping app for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world.

With millions of cricketers using CricHeroes to live score their local cricket matches and tournaments digitally, it is already the #1 FREE Cricket Scoring App in the world. It is also the editor’s choice with more than 4.7 ratings!
Detailed Features and Benefits:

Live Cricket Scores with Ball by Ball Commentary

- Live cricket score updates of your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments
- Ball by ball commentary with detailed cricket graphs and match analysis
- Full cricket match scorecard with highlights, over-wise scores, and match gallery
- Analyse your cricket match digitally with Wagon Wheel, Manhattan Graph, Worm Graph, Run Rate Graphs.
- Get automatic heroes of the match: Player of the Match, Best Batsman, Best Bowler.
- Algorithmically calculated Most Valuable Player (MVP) of the match.
- Live stream your local cricket matches just the way you see them on TV.
- Real-time leaderboard for your cricket tournament.
- Automatic points table (standings) with net run rate for your cricket tournament.
- Create a schedule automatically for your cricket tournament.

Live Streaming

Live stream your cricket matches using just the mobile phone or using OBS, VMix or any other such software on your laptop.
Give your followers live updates of your cricket match.
Get an international-grade score ticker on your live stream.
Get videos of every ball of your match attached with the commentary.
Get highlights of player innings on the full cricket scorecard.
Cricket Feed

A personalised cricket feed with all yours and your followees’ matches, tournaments, badges and awards. Never miss a chance to appreciate your friends’ great innings.

In short, a complete cricket experience crafted especially for the grassroots cricketers and cricket enthusiasts.

CricHeroes is made with love by passionate cricketers for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world!

NOTE: If you are using Samsung J7, please download build from here - https://bit.ly/3iGDx7z

📺 Live stream your local cricket tournaments and cricket matches like international matches.

😎 Get your own world-class cricket profile with cricket stats like an international cricketer.

🏅 Show your talent and get recognition (badges, awards and offers) for your every achievement on cricket ground.

🏆 If you are a tournament organiser, register and manage your entire cricket tournament absolutely FREE! Get a dedicated tournament page, leaderboard, points table (standings), schedule, boundary tracker, and more along with live cricket scoring.

🗓️ Create an automatic cricket schedule for your tournament in a few clicks with the help of an auto-schedule generator.

Know how much margin your team needs to win in your group match to qualify for the knock-outs with the help of Smart NRR Calculator.

🎦 Cricket Feed - Enjoy cricket videos, cricket news, cricket quizzes, cricket polls, cricket stories and remain updated with friends’ matches on CricHeroes Feed.

🛍 CricHeroes Market - The ultimate place to sell your cricket products, cricket services, or cricket skills with millions of cricket enthusiasts in India and abroad.

🗒 Cricket Community - Book Scorers, Umpires, Commentators, Grounds for your cricket matches and cricket tournaments. Find Cricket Academies, Cricket Shops near you. Contact Bat Manufacturers, Cricket Uniform Designers, Trophy Vendors directly.

📊 CricInsights - Become a world-class cricketer by analysing your own and others’ strengths and weaknesses with CricInsights. Know your form, find preferred batting and bowling positions, compare yourself with friends and much more.

CricHeroes is a world-class cricket scorekeeping app for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world.

With millions of cricketers using CricHeroes to live score their local cricket matches and tournaments digitally, it is already the #1 FREE Cricket Scoring App in the world. It is also the editor’s choice with more than 4.7 ratings!
Detailed Features and Benefits:

Live Cricket Scores with Ball by Ball Commentary

- Live cricket score updates of your local cricket matches and cricket tournaments
- Ball by ball commentary with detailed cricket graphs and match analysis
- Full cricket match scorecard with highlights, over-wise scores, and match gallery
- Analyse your cricket match digitally with Wagon Wheel, Manhattan Graph, Worm Graph, Run Rate Graphs.
- Get automatic heroes of the match: Player of the Match, Best Batsman, Best Bowler.
- Algorithmically calculated Most Valuable Player (MVP) of the match.
- Live stream your local cricket matches just the way you see them on TV.
- Real-time leaderboard for your cricket tournament.
- Automatic points table (standings) with net run rate for your cricket tournament.
- Create a schedule automatically for your cricket tournament.

Live Streaming

Live stream your cricket matches using just the mobile phone or using OBS, VMix or any other such software on your laptop.
Give your followers live updates of your cricket match.
Get an international-grade score ticker on your live stream.
Get videos of every ball of your match attached with the commentary.
Get highlights of player innings on the full cricket scorecard.
Cricket Feed

A personalised cricket feed with all yours and your followees’ matches, tournaments, badges and awards. Never miss a chance to appreciate your friends’ great innings.

In short, a complete cricket experience crafted especially for the grassroots cricketers and cricket enthusiasts.

CricHeroes is made with love by passionate cricketers for the passionate cricketers and cricket fans of the world!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s New in Version 12.2
Smarter Search
Find nearby matches and tournaments faster than ever — and quickly access your last search results too!
Private Team Attendance
You asked, we listened!
Now, team attendance is private, so opponents can no longer see your squad before the match.
Redesigned Direct Messages
We’ve redesigned DMs for a faster, smoother experience — making internal communication across CricHeroes easier than ever.
